ref: 4110 gāṅgēruka n. ʻ grain of the plant Uraria lago- podioides ʼ, ˚kī -- f. ʻ the plant ʼ Suśr. 2. gāṅgēya -- n. ʻ root of Scirpus kysoor or of a Cyperus ʼ Suśr.
P. gaṅger f. ʻ Grewia betulaefolia, Sageretia brandrethiana, Ehretia aspera, Lycium europaeum ʼ;
H. gãgerū, ˚ran ʻ Uraria lagopodioides (used as a drug) ʼ, gãgeruwā ʻ a hill tree with fruit like myrobolans used against phlegm ʼ.
